fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
We have been active in the European Committee of Standardization. 
We are a member of the Steering Committee of the Explosive Knowledge Centre established within the International CBRNE Institute in Les Bons Villers, Belgium. 
We are a NATO member country

goals__remit:
The Centre was established in 2003 as the first institution in the Republic of Croatia which conducts research, development and education in the field of humanitarian demining. 
The goal of the Centre is to gather the most experienced staff in the field of mine action and to conduct the three core business activities with the aim of countering the plague of landmines worldwide. These three core activities are: 
- Development and validation of new methodologies and techniques of mine detection and mine action 
- Education of mine action staff 
- Testing and certification of mine action equipment 
- Organization of seminars and workshops
